TopicTitle: [1.0] Quickload opens new instance, Quicksave not working

Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I have the following issue with 1.0 on windows 7 64bit:

Stock game, created new career (with quicksave/load available). Normal game only with destructible buildings disabled.

- Quicksave (F5) doesn't work at all, no quicksave.sfs in save folder
- Quickload (F9) opens a complete new instance of the game

I installed the game from scratch, doesn't help. Keybindings are correct.

Just wanted to report it and see if somebody can confirm this or if I have done something really dumb to break it.

Thanks,

Jaden

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T21:12:35Z" title="04/27/2015 09:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Jaden**
  
Solved!
Hi Jaden, where is KSP installed? And can you check the support stickies and post your logs please.

Steam installation: C:\Games\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program

Log: [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26398773/output_log.txt](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26398773/output_log.txt)

KSP.log: [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26398773/KSP.log](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26398773/KSP.log)

Thanks for looking into it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T21:01:08Z" title="04/27/2015 09:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Jaden**
  
added KSP.log

Ok I am an Idiot. Sorry for wasting everybody's time.

The Keyboard functions were set incorrectly ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) It wasn't even recognizing F5 as F5. I'm still not sure why it would open a new instance of KSP (M600, [a]-key default Task) but it doesn't matter.

Again sorry for wasting resources. Thanks anyway and keep it up!

Jaden
Heh, not a problem Jaden, you may not be the only one to get this issue so your thread can help others ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
